statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 17 \\ 9 \\ 16 \\ -11 \\ 31 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 2 \\ 10 \\ -12 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 25 \\ 13 \\ 16 \\ -8 \\ 41 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
